# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-105">준수 센터의 DLP(데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에 사용할 준비가 된 많은 중요한 정보 유형이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-106">이 문서에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형을 나열하고 DLP 정책이 각 유형을 검색할 때 검색하는 정보를 보여 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-108">키워드 및 체크 수표와 같은 증분 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-108">Corroborative evidence, like keywords and checksums, can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-110">중요한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-113">중요한 정보 유형이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-113">Sensitive information types are used in:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="58649-114">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-114">Data loss prevention policies</span></span>](data-loss-prevention-policies.md) 
- [<span data-ttu-id="58649-115">민감도 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-115">Sensitivity labels</span></span>](sensitivity-labels.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="58649-116">보존 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-116">Retention labels</span></span>](retention.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="58649-117">커뮤니케이션 규정 준수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-117">Communication compliance</span></span>](communication-compliance.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="58649-118">자동 레이블 지정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-118">Auto-labelling policies</span></span>](apply-sensitivity-label-automatically.md#how-to-configure-auto-labeling-for-office-apps)

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-119">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-120">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-121">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-122">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-123">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-124">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 네 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-125">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-126">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-127">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-128">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-129">무형: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 9자리 연속 자릿수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-130">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-131">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-133">정책은 300자 이내의 접근성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도 중간 정도의 신뢰를 가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-134">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-135">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-136">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-137">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-155">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-156">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-157">8자리 숫자(또는 기간이 없는 경우)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-158">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-159">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-160">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-161">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-162">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-163">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-164">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-165">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-166">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-167">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-168">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-169">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-170">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-176">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-176">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-177">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-177">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-182">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-183">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-184">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-186">계정 번호는 6자리에서 10자리까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-187">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-188">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-189">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-190">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-191">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-194">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-195">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-196">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-197">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-198">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-198">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-199">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-200">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-216">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-216">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-217">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-217">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-218">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-218">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-219">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-219">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-220">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-220">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-221">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-221">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-222">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-222">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-223">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-224">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-224">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-225">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-226">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-226">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-227">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-228">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-229">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-230">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-231">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-231">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-232">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-233">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-233">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-234">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-235">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-237">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-238">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-238">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-239">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-239">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-240">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-241">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-241">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-251">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-251">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-252">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-252">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-253">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-253">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-254">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-254">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-255">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-255">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-256">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-256">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-257">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-257">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-258">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-259">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-259">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-260">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-261">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-261">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-262">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-263">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-264">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-264">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-265">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-265">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-266">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-266">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-267">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-268">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-270">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-271">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-271">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-272">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-272">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-273">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-274">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-274">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-284">호주 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-284">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-285">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-286">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-286">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-288">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-288">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-289">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-289">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-290">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-290">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-291">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-292">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-293">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-294">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-295">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-295">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-296">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-297">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-298">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-299">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-300">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-301">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-302">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-303">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-403">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-404">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-405">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-407">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-408">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-408">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-409">9자리 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-409">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-410">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-410">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-411">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-411">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-412">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-413">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-415">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-416">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-417">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-418">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-430">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-431">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-432">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-434">문자(대소문자 구분 안 ) 다음에 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-435">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-436">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-437">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-438">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-439">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-440">또는 Keyword_passport Keyword_australia_passport_number 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-474">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-475">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-476">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-478">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-479">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-480">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-481">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-482">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-483">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-484">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-485">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-486">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-487">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-488">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-489">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-490">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-502">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-503">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-504">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-505">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-506">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-507">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-508">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-509">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-510">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-511">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-512">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-639">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-640">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-641">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-642">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-643">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-644">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-645">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-646">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-647">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-648">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-649">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="58649-650">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-651">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-652">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-653">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-655">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-656">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-657">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-660">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-660">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-661">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-661">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-663">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-664">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-665">문자 1개, 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-667">문자 1자, 숫자 7자 및 공백 1개 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-668">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-669">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-670">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-671">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-672">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-674">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-675">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-676">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-677">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-678">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-679">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-680">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-704">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-704">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-705">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-706">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-706">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-707">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-708">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-708">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-709">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-709">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-710">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-710">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-711">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-711">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-712">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-712">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-713">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-713">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-714">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-714">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-715">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-715">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-716">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-717">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-717">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-718">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-719">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-719">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-739">sozialesicherheitkein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-739">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-745">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-745">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-746">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-747">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-747">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-748">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-749">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-749">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-750">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-750">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-751">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-751">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-752">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-752">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-753">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-753">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-754">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-754">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-755">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-756">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-756">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-757">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-758">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-758">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-759">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-760">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-760">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-761">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-761">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-762">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-762">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-763">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-763">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-764">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-764">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-765">österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-765">österreich</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-768">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-768">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-769">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-769">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-770">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-770">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-771">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-771">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-772">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-772">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-773">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-773">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-774">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-774">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-775">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-775">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-785">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-785">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-786">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-786">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-787">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-787">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-788">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-788">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-789">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-789">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-790">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-790">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-791">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-791">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-792">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-793">11자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-793">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-794">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-795">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-795">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-796">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-796">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-797">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-797">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-798">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-798">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-799">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-799">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-800">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-800">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-801">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-801">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-802">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-802">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-803">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-803">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-804">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-804">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-805">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-805">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-806">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-807">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-809">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-809">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-810">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-810">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-811">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-811">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-812">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-812">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-813">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-813">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-816">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-816">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-817">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-817">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-818">austrian vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-818">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-819">vat no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-819">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-820">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-820">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-821">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-821">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-822">austrian vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-822">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-823">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-823">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-824">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-824">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-826">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-826">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-827">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-827">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-828">vat identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-828">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-829">atu number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-829">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-830">uid number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-830">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-831">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-831">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-832">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-832">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-833">문자열 "DocumentDb" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-833">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-834">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-834">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-835">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-835">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-836">3~200자 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-836">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-837">기호(>), 등호(=), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-837">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-838">대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-838">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-839">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-839">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-840">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-841">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-842">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-843">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-843">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-844">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-844">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-845">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-845">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-846">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-846">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-847">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-847">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-848">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-848">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-849">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-849">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-850">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-850">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-851">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-851">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-852">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-852">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-853">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-853">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-854">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-854">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-855">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-855">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-856">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-856">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-857">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-857">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-858">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-858">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-859">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-859">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-860">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-860">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-861">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-861">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-862">문자열 "Server", "server", "data source" 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-862">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-863">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-863">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-864">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-864">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-865">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-865">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-866">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-867">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-867">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-868">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-868">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-869">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-869">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-870">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-870">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-871">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-871">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-872">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-872">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-873">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-873">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-874">net", "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-874">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-875">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-875">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-876">1에서 300 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-876">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-877">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-877">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-878">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-878">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-879">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-879">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-880">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-880">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-881">세미콜론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-881">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-882">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-882">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-883">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-884">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-884">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-885">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-886">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-886">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-887">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-887">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-888">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-888">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
