## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-903">Azure IoT 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-903">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-904">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-905">문자열 "HostName" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열(문자열 "azure-devices")입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-905">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-906">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-906">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-907">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-908">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-908">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-909">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-909">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-910">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-910">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-911">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-912">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-912">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-913">문자열 "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-913">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-914">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-914">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-915">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-915">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-916">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-916">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-917">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-917">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-918">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-918">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-919">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-919">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-920">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-920">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-921">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-921">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-922">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-923">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-924">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-925">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-926">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-926">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-927">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-927">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-942">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-942">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-943">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-944">문자열 "userpwd=" 다음에 영문 문자열이 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-944">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-945">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-945">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-946">문자열 "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-946">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-947">소문자 60자 또는 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-947">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-948">인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-948">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-949">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-949">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-950">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-950">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-951">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-951">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-952">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-952">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-953">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-953">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-954">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-954">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-969">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-969">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-970">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-971">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-971">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-972">net" 다음에 문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-972">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-973">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-974">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-974">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-975">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-975">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-976">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-976">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-977">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-977">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-978">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-978">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-979">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-979">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-980">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-980">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-981">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-981">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-982">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-982">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-983">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-984">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-985">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-986">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-986">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-987">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-987">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-988">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-988">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-989">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-989">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1003">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1003">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1004">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1005">문자열 "sig" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1005">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1007">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1007">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1008">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1008">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1009">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1009">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1010">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1010">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1011">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%) 중 소문자 또는 대문자인 43-53자 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1011">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1012">문자열 "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1012">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1013">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1013">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1014">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1015">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1015">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1016">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1017">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1017">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1018">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1018">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1019">Azure 서비스 버스 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1019">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1020">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1021">문자열 "Servicebus.windows"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 이어지며 문자열 "EndPoint"가 그 다음에 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1021">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-1022">net" 및 "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1022">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1023">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1023">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1024">문자열 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1024">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1025">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1025">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1026">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1026">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1027">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1027">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1028">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1028">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1029">문자열 "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1029">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-1030">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1030">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1031">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1031">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1032">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1032">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1033">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1033">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1034">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1034">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1035">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1035">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1036">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1036">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1037">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1037">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1038">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1038">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1039">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1039">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1040">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1040">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1041">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1041">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1042">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1042">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1043">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1043">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1045">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1045">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1056">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1056">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-1057">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1057">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1058">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1058">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1059">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1060">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"에 문자열 "AccountKey"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 이어지며</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1060">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1061">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1061">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1062">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1062">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1063">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1063">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1064">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1064">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1065">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1066">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1066">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1067">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1067">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1068">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1069">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1069">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1070">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1070">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1071">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1071">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1072">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1072">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1073">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1073">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1074">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1074">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1075">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1075">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1076">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1076">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1077">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1077">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1078">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1078">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1079">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1079">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1080">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1080">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1081">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1081">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1082">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1082">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1084">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1084">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1097">Azure Storage 계정 키(일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1097">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1098">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1099">아래 패턴에 설명된 86개 이하 또는 대문자, 자릿수, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1099">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1100">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1100">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1101">기호(>), 아포스트로피('), 등호(=), 따로 표시(") 또는 숫자 기호(#) 중 하나까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1101">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1102">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1102">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1103">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1103">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1104">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1104">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1105">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1105">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1106">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1107">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1107">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1108">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1108">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1109">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1109">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1110">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1110">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1111">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1111">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1112">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1112">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1113">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1113">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1114">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1115">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1115">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1116">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1117">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1117">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1118">`Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1118">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1119">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1119">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1252">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1252">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1253">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1254">11자리 숫자와 선택적분자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1254">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1255">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1256">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1256">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1257">YY 형식의 6자리 숫자와 2개의 선택적 기간 생년월일용 MM.DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1257">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1258">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 delimiter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1258">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1259">3개의 일직선 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 홀수)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1259">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1260">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 delimiter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1260">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1261">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1261">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1262">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1263">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1263">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1264">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1265">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1266">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1266">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1267">검색된 Keyword_belgium_national_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1267">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1268">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1268">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1269">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1269">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1270">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1270">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1271">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1271">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1330">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1330">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1331">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1332">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 6자리 숫자(공백 또는 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1332">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1334">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1334">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1335">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1336">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1336">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1337">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="58649-1338">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1339">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1339">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1340">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1340">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1341">정규식은 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 에서 키워드를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾을 수 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1341">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1342">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1342">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1343">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1343">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1344">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1344">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1371">벨기에 부가가치 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1371">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-1372">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1373">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1374">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1375">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1376">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1377">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1378">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1379">12자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1379">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1380">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1381">12자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1381">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1382">문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1382">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1383">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1383">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1384">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1384">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1385">1에서 9까지의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1385">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1386">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1386">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1387">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1387">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1388">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1388">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1389">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1389">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1390">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1391">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1391">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1392">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1393">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1393">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1394">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1394">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1395">검색된 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1395">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1396">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1396">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1397">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1397">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1398">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1398">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1399">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1399">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1400">nº tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1400">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1401">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1401">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1402">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1402">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1403">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1403">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1404">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1404">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1405">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1405">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1406">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1406">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1407">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1407">btw#</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1409">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1409">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1410">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1411">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1411">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1412">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1413">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1413">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1414">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1415">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1415">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1416">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1417">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1417">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1418">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1418">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1419">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1419">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1420">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1420">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1421">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1421">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1422">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1422">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1423">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1424">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1424">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1425">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1426">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1427">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1427">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1428">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cpf 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1428">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1429">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1429">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1430">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1430">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1431">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1431">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1432">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1432">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1434">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1434">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1444">브라질 법인 번호(CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1444">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1445">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1445">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1446">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1446">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1447">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1447">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1448">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1448">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1449">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1449">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1450">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1450">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1451">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1451">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1452">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1452">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1453">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1453">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1454">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1454">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1455">4자리 분기 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1455">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1456">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1456">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1457">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1457">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1458">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1459">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1459">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1460">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1461">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1461">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1462">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1462">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1463">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1463">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1464">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1464">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1465">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1466">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1466">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1467">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1481">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1481">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1489">브라질 국가 ID 카드(RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1489">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1490">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1491">Registro Geral(이전 형식): 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1491">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1492">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식): 11자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1492">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1493">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1494">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1494">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1495">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1495">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1496">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1496">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1497">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1497">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1498">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1498">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1499">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1499">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1500">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1500">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1501">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1501">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1502">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1502">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1503">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1503">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1504">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1504">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1505">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1505">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1506">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1507">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1507">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1508">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1509">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1509">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1510">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1510">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1511">검색된 Keyword_brazil_rg 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1511">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1512">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1513">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1513">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1514">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1514">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1515">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1515">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1516">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1516">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1517">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1517">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1518">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1518">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1519">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1519">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1520">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1520">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1521">RG(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1521">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1522">RIC(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1522">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1523">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1523">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1524">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1525">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1525">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1526">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1527">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1527">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1528">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1529">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1529">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1530">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1531">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1531">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1532">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1532">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1533">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1533">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1660">불가리아 유니폼 내선 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1660">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-1661">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1661">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1662">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1662">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1663">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1663">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1664">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1664">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1665">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1665">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1666">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1666">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1667">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1668">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1668">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1669">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1670">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1670">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1671">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1671">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1672">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1672">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1673">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 10진수와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1673">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1674">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1674">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1675">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1676">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1676">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1677">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1678">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1678">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1679">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1679">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1680">시작  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1680">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1681">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1681">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1682">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1682">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1727">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1727">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1728">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1728">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1729">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1729">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1730">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1730">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1731">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1731">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1732">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1732">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1733">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1733">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1734">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1734">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1735">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1735">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1736">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1736">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1737">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1737">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1738">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1738">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1739">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1739">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1740">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1740">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1741">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1761">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1761">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1762">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1763">7자리 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1763">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1764">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1765">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7자리 또는 12자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1765">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1766">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1766">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1767">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1767">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1768">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1768">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1769">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1769">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1770">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1770">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1771">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1771">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1772">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1773">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1773">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1774">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1775">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1775">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1776">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1776">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1777">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1777">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1778">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1778">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1779">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1779">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1780">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1780">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1781">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1781">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
