## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1805">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1805">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1806">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1807">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1807">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1809">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1809">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1810">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1811">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1811">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1813">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1813">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1814">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1814">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1815">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1815">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1816">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1816">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1952">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1952">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1953">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1953">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="58649-1954">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1954">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1955">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1956">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1956">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1957">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1958">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1959">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1960">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1961">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1961">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1962">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1962">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1963">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1963">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1964">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1964">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1965">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1965">personal health number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1967">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1967">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1968">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1968">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1969">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1969">automobile accident</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1974">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1974">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1975">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1976">대문자 2자, 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1976">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1977">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1978">대문자 2자, 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1978">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1979">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1980">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1980">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-1981">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-1982">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1983">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1983">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-1984">또는 Keyword_canada_passport_number Keyword_passport 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-1984">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2014">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2014">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2015">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2016">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2016">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2018">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2018">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2019">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2020">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2021">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2022">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2022">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2023">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2023">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2024">두 개 이상의 Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2024">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2057">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2057">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2058">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2059">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2059">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2060">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2061">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2061">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2062">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2062">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2063">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2063">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2064">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2064">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2065">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2065">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2066">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2066">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2067">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2067">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2068">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2069">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2069">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2070">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2071">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2072">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2072">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2073">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2073">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-2074">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2074">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-2075">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2075">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-2076">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2076">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2077">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2077">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2078">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2078">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2079">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2079">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2080">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2080">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2081">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2081">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2106">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2106">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2107">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2108">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2108">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2110">7-8자리 숫자와 함께하는 데 10자리 숫자를 더한 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2110">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2111">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2111">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2112">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2112">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2113">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2113">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2114">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2114">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2115">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2115">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2116">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2116">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2117">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2117">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2118">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2119">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2121">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2122">이 Func_chile_id_card 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2122">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2123">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2123">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2124">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2125">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2126">이 Func_chile_id_card 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2126">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2127">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2127">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2164">중국 거주자 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2164">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2165">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2166">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2166">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2167">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2168">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2168">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2169">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2169">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2170">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2170">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2171">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2171">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2172">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2172">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2173">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2174">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2174">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2175">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2176">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2176">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2177">이 Func_china_resident_id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2177">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2178">검색된 Keyword_china_resident_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2178">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2179">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2179">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2180">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2180">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2181">이 Func_china_resident_id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2181">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2182">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2182">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2183">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2183">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2184">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2184">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2185">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2185">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2186">PRC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2186">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2187">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2187">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2188">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2188">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2189">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2189">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2190">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2190">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2191">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2191">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2192">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2192">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2193">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2193">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2194">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2194">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2195">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2195">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2196">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2197">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는(dddddd)될 수 있으며 Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2197">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2198">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2199">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 기프트 카드 및 다이너 카드를 비롯한 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드의 카드를 감지하는 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2199">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2200">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2201">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2201">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2203">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2204">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2204">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2205">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2205">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-2206">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2206">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-2207">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2207">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-2208">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2208">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2209">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2210">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2210">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2211">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2211">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2212">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2213">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2213">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2223">security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2223">security number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2226">issue no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2226">issue no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2227">cryptogramme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2227">cryptogramme</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2472">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2472">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2473">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2474">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2474">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2475">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2476">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2476">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2477">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2477">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2478">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2478">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2479">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2479">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2480">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2480">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2481">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2481">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2482">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2482">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2606">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2606">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-2607">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2607">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-2608">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2608">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2609">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2610">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2610">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2611">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2612">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2612">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2613">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2614">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2615">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2616">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2616">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2617">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2617">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2618">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2618">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2649">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2649">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2650">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2651">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2651">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2652">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2653">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2653">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2654">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2654">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2655">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2655">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2656">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2656">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2657">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2657">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2658">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2658">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2659">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2659">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2660">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2660">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2661">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2662">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2662">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2663">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2663">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2677">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2677">broj putovnice</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2681">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2681">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2682">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2683">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2685">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2685">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2686">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2686">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2687">마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2687">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2688">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2689">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2690">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2691">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2691">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2692">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2692">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2693">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2693">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2694">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2695">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2696">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2697">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2728">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2728">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2729">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2729">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2730">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2730">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2731">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2731">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2732">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2732">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2733">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2734">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2734">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2735">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2736">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2737">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2737">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2738">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2738">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2862">άδειες οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2862">άδειες οδήγησης</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2863">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2863">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-2864">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2864">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2865">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2865">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2866">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2866">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2867">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2867">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2868">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2868">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2869">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2869">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2870">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2871">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2871">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2872">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2873">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2873">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2874">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2875">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2875">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2876">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2877">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2878">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2878">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2879">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2879">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2881">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2881">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2888">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2888">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2889">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2889">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2890">1개 문자와 공백이나 따로 6-8자리 숫자(공백 또는 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2890">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2891">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2891">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2892">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2892">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2893">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2893">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2894">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2894">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2895">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2895">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2896">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2896">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2897">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2897">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2898">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2898">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2899">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD/MM/YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2899">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2900">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2901">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2901">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2902">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2902">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2931">키프로스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2931">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-2932">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2932">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2933">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2933">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2934">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2934">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2935">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2935">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2936">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2936">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2937">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2937">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2938">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2939">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2939">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2941">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2941">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2942">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2942">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2943">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2943">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2944">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2944">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2945">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2946">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2946">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2947">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2948">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2948">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2949">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2949">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2950">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2950">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-2951">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2952">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2952">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2976">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2976">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2977">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2977">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2978">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2978">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2979">φορολογικού κωδικού</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2979">φορολογικού κωδικού</span></span>


## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2980">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2980">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2981">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2982">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2982">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2983">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2984">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2984">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2985">'E' 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2985">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2986">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2986">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2987">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2987">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2988">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2988">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2989">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2989">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2990">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2990">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-2991">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2991">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-2992">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2992">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2993">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2993">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-2994">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-2994">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3120">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3120">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3121">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3122">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3122">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3123">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3124">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3124">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3125">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3126">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3126">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3127">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3128">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3128">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3129">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3129">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3130">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3130">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3131">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3131">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3132">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3132">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3133">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3133">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3134">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3134">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3156">체코 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3156">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3157">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3158">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3158">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3159">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3160">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3160">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3161">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3161">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3162">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3162">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3163">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3163">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3164">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3164">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3165">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3165">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3166">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3166">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3167">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3167">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3168">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3169">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3169">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3170">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3171">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3172">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3172">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3173">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3173">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3174">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3174">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3175">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3176">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3176">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3177">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3177">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3224">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3224">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3225">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3225">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3226">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3226">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3227">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3227">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3228">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3228">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3229">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3230">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3230">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3231">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3232">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3232">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3233">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3233">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3234">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3234">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
