## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3358">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3358">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3359">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3360">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3360">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3361">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3362">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3362">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3363">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3364">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3364">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3365">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3366">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3366">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3367">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3367">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3368">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3368">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3369">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 검색한 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3369">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3370">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3370">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3371">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3371">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3372">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3372">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3392">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3392">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3393">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3394">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3394">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3395">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3396">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3396">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3397">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3397">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3398">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3398">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3399">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3399">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3400">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3401">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3402">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3403">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3404">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3404">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3405">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3405">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3406">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3406">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3407">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3407">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3408">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3408">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3409">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3409">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3481">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3481">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3482">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3483">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3483">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3484">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3484">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3485">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3485">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3486">등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux와 같은 가능한 문자 집합에서 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3486">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3487">한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )는 등록 기관의 성 또는 숫자 '9'의 첫 번째 문자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3487">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3488">7자리 숫자( 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3488">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3489">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3490">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3490">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3491">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3492">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3492">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3493">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3493">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3494">키워드를 `Keyword_dea_number` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3494">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3495">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3495">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3496">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3496">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3497">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3497">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3498">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3498">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3499">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3499">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3500">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3500">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3501">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3501">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3502">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3502">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3503">마약 집행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3503">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3504">마약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3504">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3505">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3505">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3506">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3507">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3507">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3509">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3509">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3510">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3510">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3511">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3511">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3512">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3513">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3513">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3515">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3515">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3516">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3516">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3517">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3517">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3643">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3643">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-3644">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3644">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3645">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3645">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3646">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3646">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3647">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3647">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3648">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3648">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3649">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3649">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3650">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3651">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3651">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3652">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3653">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3653">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3654">성 및 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1-2세대, 19세, 3-4: 20 세기, 5-6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3654">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3655">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3655">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3656">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3656">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3657">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3657">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3658">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3659">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3659">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3660">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3661">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3661">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3662">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3662">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3663">시작  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3663">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-3664">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3664">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3665">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3665">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3698">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3698">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3699">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3699">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3700">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력하고 공백이나 따로 문자를 1개씩 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3700">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3701">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3701">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3702">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3702">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3703">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3704">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3704">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3705">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3706">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3707">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3707">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3708">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3709">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3709">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3710">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3710">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3711">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3711">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3712">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3712">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3730">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3730">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3731">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3732">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3732">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3733">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3734">복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3734">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3735">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3736">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3736">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-3737">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-3738">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3738">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3739">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3739">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3740">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3740">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-3741">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3741">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-3742">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3742">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-3743">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3743">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-3744">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3744">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-3745">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3745">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-3746">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-3746">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4193">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4193">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4194">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4195">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4195">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4196">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4197">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4197">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4198">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4198">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4199">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4199">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4200">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4200">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4201">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4201">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4202">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4202">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4203">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4203">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4204">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4204">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4205">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4205">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4206">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4206">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4207">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4207">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4338">핀란드 유럽 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4338">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-4339">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4339">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4340">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4340">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4341">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4341">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4342">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4342">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4343">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4343">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4344">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4344">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4345">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4346">20자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4346">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4347">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4348">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4348">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4349">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4349">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4350">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4350">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4351">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4351">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4352">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4353">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4354">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4355">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4356">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4356">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4357">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4357">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4363">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4363">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4375">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4375">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4376">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4377">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4377">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4378">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4379">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4379">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4380">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4380">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4381">century 마커('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4381">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4382">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4382">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4383">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4383">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4384">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4385">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4385">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4386">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4387">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4387">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4388">함수가 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4388">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4389">검색된 Keyword_finnish_national_id 발견</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4389">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4390">체크 체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4390">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4391">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4391">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4392">함수가 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4392">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4393">체크 체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4393">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4442">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4442">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4443">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4443">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4444">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4444">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-4445">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4445">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4446">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-4447">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4447">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4448">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4449">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4449">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4450">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4451">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4453">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4453">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4454">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4454">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4455">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4455">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4456">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4456">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4457">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4457">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4458">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4458">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4459">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4459">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4483">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4483">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4484">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4484">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4485">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4486">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4486">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4488">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4488">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4489">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4490">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4490">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4491">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4492">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4492">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4493">함수가 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4493">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4494">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4494">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4621">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4621">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-4622">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4622">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4623">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4623">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4624">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4624">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4625">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4625">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4626">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4626">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4627">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4627">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4628">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4629">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4629">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4630">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4630">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4631">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4631">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4632">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4632">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4633">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4633">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4634">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4634">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4635">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4635">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4636">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4636">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4637">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4638">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4639">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4640">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4640">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4641">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4641">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4642">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4642">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4643">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4643">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4644">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4644">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4645">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4645">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4646">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4646">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4647">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4647">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4648">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4648">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4649">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4650">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4650">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4651">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4652">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4652">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4653">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4654">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4655">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4656">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4656">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4657">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4657">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4658">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4658">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4659">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4659">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4660">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4660">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4664">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4664">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4665">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4665">cni</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4667">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4667">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4668">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4668">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4669">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4669">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4670">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4670">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4671">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4671">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4672">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4672">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-4673">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4673">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-4674">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4674">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4675">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4676">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4676">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4677">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4677">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4678">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4678">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4679">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4679">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4680">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4680">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4681">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4681">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4682">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4683">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4683">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4684">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4685">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4685">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4686">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4686">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4687">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4687">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4688">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4688">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4689">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4689">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4690">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4690">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4691">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4691">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4722">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4722">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4723">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4724">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4724">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4725">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4726">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4726">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4727">13자리 숫자, 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4727">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-4728">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4728">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4729">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4729">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4730">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4731">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4732">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4733">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4734">이 `Func_french_insee` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4734">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4735">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4735">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4736">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4737">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4737">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4738">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4738">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4739">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4758">no d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4758">no d'identite</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4770">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4770">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4771">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4772">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4772">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4773">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4774">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4774">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4775">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4775">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4776">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4776">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4777">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4777">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4778">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4778">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4779">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4779">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4780">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4780">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4781">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4781">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4782">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4782">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4783">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4783">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4784">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4784">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4785">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4786">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4786">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4787">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4788">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4789">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4789">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4790">시작  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4790">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-4791">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4792">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4792">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4812">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4812">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-4813">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4813">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4814">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4814">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4815">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4815">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4816">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4816">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4817">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4817">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4818">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4818">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4819">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4820">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4820">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4822">영문자 13자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4822">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4823">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4823">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4824">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4824">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4825">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4825">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4826">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4826">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4827">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4827">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4828">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4828">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4829">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4829">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4830">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4830">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4831">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4831">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4832">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4833">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4833">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4834">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4835">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4835">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4836">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4836">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4837">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4837">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4838">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4838">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4839">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4839">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4852">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4852">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4853">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4853">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-4854">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4854">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4855">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4856">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4856">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4857">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4858">11자리 숫자 및 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 됨):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4858">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4859">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4859">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4860">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4860">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4861">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4861">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4862">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4862">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4863">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4863">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4864">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4865">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4865">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-4866">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-4867">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4867">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4868">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4868">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4869">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4869">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-4870">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-4870">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
