## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5019">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5019">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5020">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5021">2010년 11월 1일: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5021">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5022">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5022">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5023">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5024">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5024">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5025">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5025">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5026">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5026">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5027">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5027">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5028">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5028">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5029">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5029">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5030">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5030">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5031">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5031">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5032">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5032">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5033">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5033">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5034">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5034">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5035">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5035">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5036">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5036">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5038">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5038">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5039">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5039">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5040">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5040">identifikation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5042">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5042">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5043">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5043">identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5048">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5048">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5049">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5049">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5050">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5050">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5051">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5051">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5052">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5053">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5053">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5054">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5054">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5055">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5055">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5056">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5056">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5057">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5057">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5058">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5058">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5059">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5059">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5060">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5061">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5062">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5063">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5064">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5064">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5065">키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5065">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5066">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5067">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5067">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5068">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5068">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5069">키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5069">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5070">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5070">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5084">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5084">passport #</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5093">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5093">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5094">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5094">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5095">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5095">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5096">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5096">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5097">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5097">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5098">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5098">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5099">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5099">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5100">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5100">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5101">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5101">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5102">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5102">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5103">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5103">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5104">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5104">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5105">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5105">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5106">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5107">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5107">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5108">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5109">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5110">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5110">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5111">시작  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5111">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5112">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5113">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5113">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5114">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5114">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5115">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5115">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5132">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5132">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5133">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5133">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5134">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5134">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5139">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5139">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5140">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5140">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5141">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5141">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5142">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5142">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5143">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5143">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5144">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5144">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5145">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5145">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5146">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5147">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5147">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5148">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5149">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5149">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5150">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5150">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5151">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5151">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5152">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5152">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5153">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5154">선택적 공백 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5154">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5155">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5155">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5156">선택적 공백 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5156">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5157">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5157">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5158">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5159">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5160">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5161">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5162">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5162">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5163">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5163">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5164">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5165">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5165">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5166">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5166">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5167">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5167">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5168">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5168">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5169">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5169">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5170">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5170">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5171">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5171">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5172">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5172">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5173">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5173">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5174">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5174">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5175">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5175">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5176">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5176">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5177">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5178">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5178">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5180">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5180">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5181">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5182">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5183">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5184">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5185">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5185">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5186">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5312">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5312">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5313">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5314">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5314">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5315">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5316">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5316">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5317">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5317">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5318">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5318">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5319">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5319">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5320">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5320">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5321">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5321">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5322">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5322">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5323">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5323">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5324">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5324">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5325">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5325">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5326">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5326">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5327">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5327">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5328">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5328">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5329">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5329">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5330">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5330">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5331">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5331">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5332">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5332">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5333">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5333">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5334">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5334">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5335">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5335">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5336">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5336">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5337">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5337">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5338">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5338">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5339">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5339">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5340">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5340">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5341">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5341">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5342">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5342">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5343">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5344">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자(공백이나 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5344">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5345">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5346">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5346">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5347">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5348">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5348">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5349">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5350">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5350">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5351">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5351">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5352">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5352">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5353">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5353">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5354">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5354">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5355">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5355">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5356">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5356">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5357">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5357">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5358">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5358">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5359">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5359">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5360">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5360">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5361">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5361">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5362">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5362">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5363">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5363">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5372">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5372">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5373">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5373">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5374">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5374">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5375">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5375">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5376">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5376">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5377">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5377">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5378">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5378">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5379">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5379">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5380">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5380">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5381">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5381">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5382">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5382">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5383">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5383">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5384">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5384">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5385">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5385">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5386">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5387">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5389">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5389">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5390">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5390">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5391">시작  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5391">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5392">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5392">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5393">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5393">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5398">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5398">social security no</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5404">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5404">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5405">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5406">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5407">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5408">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5409">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5410">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5411">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5412">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5412">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5413">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5414">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5414">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5415">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5416">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5416">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5418">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5418">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5419">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5419">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5420">시작  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5420">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5449">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5449">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5450">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5450">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5451">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5451">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5452">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5452">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5453">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5453">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5454">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5454">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5455">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5455">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5456">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5456">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5457">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5458">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5458">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5459">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5460">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5460">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5461">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5461">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5462">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5462">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5463">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5463">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5464">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5464">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5465">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5465">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5466">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5466">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5506">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5506">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5507">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5507">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5508">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5508">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5509">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5509">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5510">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5510">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5511">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5511">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5512">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5512">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5513">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5513">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5514">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5514">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5515">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5515">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5516">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5516">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5517">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5517">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5518">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5518">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5643">헝가리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5643">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5644">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5644">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5645">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5645">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5646">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5646">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5647">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5647">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5648">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5648">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5649">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5649">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5650">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5651">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5651">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5652">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5653">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5653">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5654">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1900년 이전의 시민 또는 시민권이 2배인 시민의 경우 1-남성, 2-여성, 기타 숫자도 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5654">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5655">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5655">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5656">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5656">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5657">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5657">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5658">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5659">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5659">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5660">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5661">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5661">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5662">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5662">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5663">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5663">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5664">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5664">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5665">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5665">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5666">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5666">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5667">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5667">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5668">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5668">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5669">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5669">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5670">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5670">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5671">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5671">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-5672">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5672">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5673">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5673">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5674">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5674">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5675">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5675">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5676">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5676">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5677">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5678">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자(공백이나 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5678">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5679">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5680">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5680">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5681">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5681">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5682">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5682">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5683">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5683">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5684">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5684">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5685">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5685">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5686">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5687">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5687">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5688">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5689">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5689">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5690">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5690">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5691">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5691">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5710">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5710">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5711">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5712">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5712">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5713">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5714">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5714">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5715">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5716">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5716">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5718">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5719">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5719">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5720">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5720">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5721">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5722">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5722">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5742">헝가리 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5742">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5743">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5743">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5744">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5744">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5745">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5745">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5746">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5746">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5747">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5747">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5748">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5748">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5749">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5750">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5750">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5751">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5751">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5752">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5752">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5753">"8"이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5753">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5754">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5754">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5755">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5755">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5756">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5757">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5757">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5758">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5759">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5759">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5760">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5760">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5761">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5761">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5762">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5762">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5763">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5763">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5789">헝가리 부가가치 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5789">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5790">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5790">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5791">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5791">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5792">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5792">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5793">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5793">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5794">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5794">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5795">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5795">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5796">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5797">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5797">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5798">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5799">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5799">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5800">두 글자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5800">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5801">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5801">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5802">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5802">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5803">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5804">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5806">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5807">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5807">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5808">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5808">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5809">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5810">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5810">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5815">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5815">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5816">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5816">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5817">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5817">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
