## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5824">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5824">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5825">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5826">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5826">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5828">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5828">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5829">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5829">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5830">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5830">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5831">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5831">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5832">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5832">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5833">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5833">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5834">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5835">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5835">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5836">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5837">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5837">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5838">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5838">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5839">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5839">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5840">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5840">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5841">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5841">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5842">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5842">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5843">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5843">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5844">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5844">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5845">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5845">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5846">인도 고유 ID(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5846">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5847">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5848">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5848">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5849">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5850">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5850">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5851">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5851">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5852">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5852">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5853">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5853">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5854">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5854">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5855">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5855">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5856">검사 숫자인 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5856">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5857">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5857">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5858">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5858">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5859">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5859">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5860">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5860">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5861">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5861">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5862">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5862">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5863">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5863">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5864">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5864">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5865">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5865">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5866">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5866">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5867">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5867">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5868">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5868">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5869">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5869">aadhaar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5871">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5871">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5872">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5872">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5873">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5873">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5874">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5874">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5875">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5875">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5876">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5877">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5877">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5878">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5879">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5879">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5880">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5880">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5881">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5881">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5882">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5882">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5883">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5883">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5884">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5884">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5885">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5885">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5886">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5886">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5887">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5887">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5888">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5888">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5889">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5889">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5890">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5890">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5891">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5891">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5892">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5892">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5893">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5893">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5894">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5894">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5895">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5895">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5896">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5896">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5897">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5897">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5898">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5898">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5899">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5899">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5900">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5901">국가 코드(2문자) 및 검사 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5901">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5902">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5903">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5903">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5904">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5904">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5905">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5905">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5906">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5906">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5907">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5907">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5908">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5908">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-5909">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5909">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5910">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5910">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5911">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5911">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5912">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5912">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5913">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5913">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5914">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5914">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5915">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5915">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5916">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5916">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5917">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5917">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5918">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5918">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5919">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5919">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5920">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5921">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5921">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5922">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5923">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5923">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5924">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5924">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5925">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5925">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5926">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5926">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5927">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5927">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5928">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5928">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5929">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5929">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5930">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5930">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5931">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5931">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5932">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5932">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5933">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5933">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-5934">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5934">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5935">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)를](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5935">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-5936">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5936">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5937">국제적인 병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5937">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5938">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5939">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5939">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5941">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5941">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5942">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5943">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5943">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5944">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5945">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5946">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5946">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5947">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5947">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5948">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5948">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5949">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5949">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5950">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5950">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5951">[ICD-9-CM(International Classification of Diseases,N9th Revision, ICD-9-CM)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5951">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-5952">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5952">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5953">ICD-Dictionary_icd_9_codes 국제질병 [분류, 9번째 수정, ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5953">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-5954">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5954">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5955">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5955">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5956">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5956">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5957">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5957">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5958">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는(기간) 및 서식 없는 버전(기간 없음)을 계정으로 표시하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5958">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5959">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5959">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-5960">서식이 있는 IPv6 번호(콜론 포함)를 계정을 표시하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5960">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5961">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5961">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5962">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5963">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5963">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5964">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5965">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5965">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5966">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5966">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5967">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5967">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5968">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5968">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5969">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5969">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5970">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5970">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5971">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5971">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5972">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5972">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5973">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5973">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5974">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5974">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5975">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5975">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5976">IP(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5976">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5977">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5977">ip address</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5981">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5981">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5982">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5983">6자리 숫자와 문자 4자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5983">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5985">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5985">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5986">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5986">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5987">4개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5987">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5988">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5989">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5989">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-5990">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-5991">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5991">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5992">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5992">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-5993">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-5993">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6117">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6117">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6118">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6119">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6119">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6120">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6121">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6121">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6122">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6122">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6123">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6123">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6124">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6125">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6127">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6127">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6128">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6128">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6129">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6129">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6130">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6130">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6131">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6131">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6132">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6132">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6133">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6133">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6157">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6157">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6158">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6159">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6159">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6160">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6160">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6161">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6161">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6162">7자리 숫자와 문자 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6162">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6163">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6164">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6164">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6165">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6165">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6166">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6166">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6167">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6167">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6168">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6168">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6169">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6169">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6170">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6170">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6171">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6171">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6172">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6172">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6173">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6173">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6174">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6174">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6175">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6175">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6176">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6176">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6177">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6177">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6178">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6178">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6179">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6179">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6180">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6180">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6225">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6225">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6226">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6226">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6227">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6227">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6228">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6228">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6229">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6229">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6230">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6230">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6231">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6231">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6232">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6233">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6233">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6234">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6234">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6235">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6235">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6236">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6236">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6237">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6238">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6238">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6239">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6240">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6241">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6241">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6242">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6242">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6243">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6243">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6244">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6244">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6245">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6245">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6246">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6246">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6247">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6247">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6248">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6248">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6249">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6249">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6250">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6251">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6251">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6252">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6253">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6253">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6254">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6255">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6255">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6256">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6257">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6257">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6258">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6258">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6259">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6259">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6260">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6260">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6279">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6279">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6280">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6280">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6281">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6282">10자리 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6282">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6283">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6284">10자리 문자와 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6284">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6285">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6285">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6286">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6286">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6287">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6287">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6288">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6288">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6289">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6290">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6290">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6291">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6292">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6292">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6293">`Regex_italy_drivers_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6293">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6294">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6294">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6421">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6421">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-6422">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6422">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6423">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6423">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6424">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6424">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6425">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6425">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6426">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6426">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6427">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6427">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6428">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6428">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6429">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6429">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6430">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6430">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6431">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6431">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6432">가족 이름의 처음 세 자석에 해당하는 3개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6432">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6433">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자석에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6433">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6434">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6434">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6435">생년월일 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6435">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6436">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6436">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6437">사람이 태어나는 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국 국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6437">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6438">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6438">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6439">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6440">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6440">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6441">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6442">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6442">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6443">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6443">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6444">시작  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6444">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-6445">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6446">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6446">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6481">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6481">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6482">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6483">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6483">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6484">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6484">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6485">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6485">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6486">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6486">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6487">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6487">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6488">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6489">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6489">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6490">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6491">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6491">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6492">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6492">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6493">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6494">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6494">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6495">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6495">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6496">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6496">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6497">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6497">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6521">이탈리아 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6521">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-6522">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6522">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6523">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6523">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6524">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6524">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6525">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6525">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6526">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6526">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6527">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6527">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6528">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6529">선택적 소수점 문자가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6529">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6530">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6531">선택적 delimiters가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6531">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6532">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6532">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6533">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6533">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6534">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6534">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6535">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6535">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6536">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6537">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6537">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6539">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6539">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6540">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6540">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6541">검색된 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6541">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6542">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6542">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6543">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6543">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6545">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6545">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6551">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6551">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6552">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6553">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6553">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6554">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6555">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6555">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6556">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6556">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6557">bank account branch code:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6557">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6558">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6558">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6559">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6559">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6560">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6560">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6561">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6562">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6564">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6564">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6565">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6565">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6566">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6566">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6567">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6567">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6568">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6568">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6569">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6569">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6570">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6570">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6571">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6571">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6572">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6572">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6619">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6619">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6620">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6620">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6621">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6621">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6622">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6622">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6623">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6623">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6624">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6625">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6626">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6627">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6627">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6628">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6628">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6629">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6629">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
