## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6667">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6667">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-6668">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6668">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6669">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6669">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6670">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6670">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6671">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6671">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6672">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6672">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6673">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6673">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6674">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6675">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6675">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6677">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6677">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6678">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6678">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6679">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6679">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6680">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6681">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6681">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6682">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6683">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6684">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6684">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6685">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6685">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6686">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6686">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6687">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6687">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6688">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6688">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6692">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6692">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6693">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6693">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6694">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6694">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6695">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6695">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6696">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6696">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6697">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6697">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6698">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6698">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6699">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6699">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6700">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6700">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-6701">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6702">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6702">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6703">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6703">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6704">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6704">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6705">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6705">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6706">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6706">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6707">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6708">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6708">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6709">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6710">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6710">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6711">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6711">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6712">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6712">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6713">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6713">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6714">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6714">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6715">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6715">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6716">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6717">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6717">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6718">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6719">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6719">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6720">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6721">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6721">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6722">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6722">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6723">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6723">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6732">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6732">個人番号カード</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6734">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6734">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6736">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6736">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6737">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6738">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6738">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6739">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6740">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6740">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6741">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6742">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6743">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6744">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6744">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6745">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6745">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6746">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6746">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6747">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6747">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6748">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6748">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6749">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6749">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6750">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6750">Passport Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6754">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6754">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6755">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6755">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6756">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6756">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6757">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6757">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6758">ストトトNo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6758">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6759">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6759">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6760">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6760">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6761">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6761">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6762">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6762">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6763">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6763">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6764">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6765">문자 및 숫자 12개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6765">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6766">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6767">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6767">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6768">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6768">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6769">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6769">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6770">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6770">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6771">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6772">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6772">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6773">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6774">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6774">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6775">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6775">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6776">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6776">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6779">거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6779">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6780">거주 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6780">Residence card no</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6785">일본 거주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6785">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6786">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6786">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6787">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6787">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6788">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6788">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6789">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6789">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6790">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6791">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6791">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6792">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6793">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6793">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6794">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6794">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6795">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6795">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6796">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6796">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6799">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6799">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6800">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6800">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6801">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6801">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6802">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6802">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6803">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6803">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6804">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6804">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6805">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6805">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6806">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6806">登録番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6808">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6808">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6809">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6810">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6810">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6811">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6812">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6812">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6813">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6813">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6814">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6814">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6815">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6815">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6816">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6816">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6817">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6818">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6819">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6820">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6820">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6821">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6821">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6822">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6822">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6823">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6823">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6824">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6824">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6825">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6825">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6846">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6846">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6847">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6848">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6848">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6849">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6850">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6850">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6851">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6851">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6852">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6852">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6853">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6854">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6854">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6855">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6856">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6857">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6857">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6858">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6858">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6982">vadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6982">vadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6983">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6983">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6984">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6985">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6985">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6986">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6986">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6987">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6987">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6988">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6988">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6989">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6989">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6990">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6990">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6991">생년월일(19번째 19번째 10년의 경우 "1", 21세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6991">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6992">4자리 숫자( 임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6992">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6993">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6993">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6994">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6994">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6995">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6995">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-6996">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6996">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6997">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6997">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-6998">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6998">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-6999">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-6999">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7000">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7000">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7001">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7001">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7002">시작  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7002">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7003">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7003">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7004">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7004">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7067">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7067">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7068">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7069">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7069">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7070">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7071">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7071">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7072">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7072">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7073">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7073">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7074">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7075">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7075">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7076">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7077">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7077">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7078">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7078">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7079">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7079">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7080">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7080">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7081">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7082">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7082">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7083">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7083">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7106">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7106">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7107">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7108">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7108">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7110">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7110">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7111">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7112">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7113">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7114">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7115">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7116">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7242">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7242">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7243">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7243">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7244">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7244">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7245">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7245">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7246">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7246">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7247">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7247">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7248">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7249">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7249">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7250">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7251">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7251">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7252">생년월일과 성별 및 세기에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1-6)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7252">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7253">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7253">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7254">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7254">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7255">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7255">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7256">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7256">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7257">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7257">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7258">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7258">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7259">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7259">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7260">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7260">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7261">시작  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7261">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7262">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7262">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7263">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7263">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7298">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7298">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7299">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7300">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7300">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7301">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7302">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7302">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7303">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7304">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7304">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7305">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7306">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7306">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7307">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7307">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7308">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7308">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7309">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7309">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7310">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7310">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7311">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7311">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7312">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7312">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7314">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7314">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7332">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7332">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7333">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7334">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7334">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7335">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7336">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7336">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7337">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7338">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7338">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7339">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7340">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7340">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7341">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7341">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7342">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7342">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7466">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7466">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7467">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7467">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7468">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7468">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7469">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7469">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7470">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7470">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7471">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7471">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7472">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7472">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7473">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7474">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7474">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7475">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7476">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7476">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7477">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7477">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7478">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7478">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7479">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7480">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7480">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7482">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7482">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7483">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7483">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7484">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7484">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7485">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7485">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7486">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7486">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7509">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7509">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7510">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7511">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7511">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7512">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7512">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7513">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7513">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7514">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7514">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7515">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7515">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7516">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7516">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7517">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7517">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7518">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7518">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7519">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7519">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7520">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7520">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7521">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7521">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7522">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7522">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7523">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7523">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7555">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7555">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7556">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7556">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7557">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7557">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7558">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7558">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7559">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7559">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7560">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7560">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7561">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7561">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7562">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7562">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7563">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7563">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7564">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7564">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7565">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7565">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7566">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7566">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7567">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7567">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7568">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7569">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7570">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7571">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7571">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7572">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7572">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7573">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7574">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7574">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7575">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7575">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7615">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7615">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7616">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7617">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7617">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7618">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7619">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7619">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7620">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7620">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7621">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7622">2문자 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7622">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7623">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7623">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7624">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7624">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7625">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7625">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7626">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7627">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7629">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7629">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7630">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7630">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7631">검색된 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7631">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7658">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7658">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7659">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7660">지정된 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7660">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7661">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7662">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7662">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7663">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7663">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7664">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7664">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7665">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7665">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7666">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7666">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7667">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7667">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7668">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7669">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7671">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7672">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7672">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7673">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7796">liċenzji-tas-pwieq</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7796">liċenzji tas-sewwieq</span></span>


## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7797">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7797">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7798">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7798">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7799">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7799">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7800">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7800">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7801">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7801">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7802">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7802">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7803">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7803">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7804">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7805">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7805">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7806">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7807">7자리 숫자와 한 글자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7807">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7808">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7808">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7809">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7809">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7810">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7811">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7811">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7813">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7813">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7814">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7814">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7815">시작  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7815">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7816">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7816">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7817">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7817">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
