## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7834">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7834">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7835">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7836">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7836">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7837">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7837">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7838">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7838">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7839">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7840">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7840">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7841">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7842">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7843">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7843">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7844">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7844">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7845">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7845">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7846">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7847">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7848">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7868">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7868">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7869">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7870">몰타어 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7870">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7871">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7871">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7872">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7872">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7873">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7873">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7874">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7875">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7875">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7876">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7876">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7877">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7877">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7878">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7878">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7879">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7879">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7880">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7881">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7881">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7882">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7883">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7883">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7884">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7884">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7885">시작  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7885">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-7886">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7886">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7887">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7887">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7920">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7920">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7921">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7922">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7922">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7923">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7924">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7924">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7925">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7925">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7926">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7926">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7927">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7927">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7928">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7928">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7929">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7929">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7930">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7931">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7933">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7933">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7934">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7934">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7935">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7935">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7936">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7960">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7960">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7961">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7961">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7962">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7962">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7963">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7963">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7964">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7964">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7965">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7966">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-7967">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-7968">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7968">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7969">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7969">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-7970">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-7970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8098">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8098">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8099">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8099">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8100">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8100">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8101">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8101">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8102">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8102">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8103">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8104">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8104">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8105">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8106">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8107">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8107">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8108">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8108">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8109">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 검색합니다(예제 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8109">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8110">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8111">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8111">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8112">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8130">네덜란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8130">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-8131">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8131">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8132">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8132">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8133">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8133">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8134">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8134">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8135">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8135">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8136">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8136">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8137">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8138">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8138">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8139">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8140">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8140">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8141">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8142">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8142">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8143">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8144">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8144">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8145">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8145">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8146">시작  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-8147">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8147">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8148">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8148">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8149">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8149">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8150">Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8150">Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8151">btw nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8151">btw nummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8186">네덜란드 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8186">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-8187">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8187">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8188">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8188">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8189">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8189">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8190">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8190">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8191">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8191">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8192">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8192">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8193">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8193">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8194">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8194">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8195">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8195">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8196">14자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8196">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8197">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8197">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8198">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8198">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8199">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8199">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8200">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8200">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8201">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8201">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8202">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8202">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8203">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8203">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8204">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8205">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8206">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8208">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8208">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8209">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8209">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8210">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8210">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8211">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8211">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8216">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8216">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8217">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8217">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8218">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8218">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8220">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8220">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-8221">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8221">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8222">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8222">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8223">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8223">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8224">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8224">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8225">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8225">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8226">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8226">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8227">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8228">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8228">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8229">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8230">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8230">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8231">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8231">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8232">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8233">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8233">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8234">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8234">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8235">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8235">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8236">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8236">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8237">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8237">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8238">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8238">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8239">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8239">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8240">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8240">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8241">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8241">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8242">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8242">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8243">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8243">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8244">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8244">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8245">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8245">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8246">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8246">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8255">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8255">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8256">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8256">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8257">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8257">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8258">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8258">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8259">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8259">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8260">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8260">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8261">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8261">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8262">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8262">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8263">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8263">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8264">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8264">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8265">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8265">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8266">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8266">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8267">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8268">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8270">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8271">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8271">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8272">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8272">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8273">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8274">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8274">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8341">뉴질랜드 내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8341">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-8342">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8342">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8343">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8343">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8344">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8344">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8345">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8345">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8346">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8346">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8347">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8347">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8348">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8349">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8349">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8350">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8351">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8351">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8352">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8352">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8353">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8353">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8354">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8354">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8355">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8355">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8356">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8356">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8357">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8358">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8358">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8359">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8360">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8361">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8361">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8362">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8362">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8363">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8363">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8364">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8364">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8366">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8366">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8370">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8370">new zealand ird</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8373">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8373">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8374">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8375">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8375">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8376">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8377">'I' 및 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8377">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8378">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8378">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8379">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8379">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8380">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8381">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8382">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8383">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8384">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8384">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8385">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8385">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8386">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8386">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8387">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8388">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8388">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8389">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8389">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8396">국가 건강 인덱스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8396">National Health Index Number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8403">뉴질랜드 사회 일지 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8403">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8404">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8404">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8405">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8405">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8406">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8406">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8407">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8407">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8408">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8408">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8409">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8409">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8410">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8411">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8411">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8412">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8413">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8413">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8414">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8415">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8415">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8416">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8417">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8417">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8418">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8418">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8419">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8420">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8420">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8421">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8422">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8423">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8423">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8424">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8424">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8425">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8425">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8426">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8426">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8428">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8428">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8434">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8434">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8435">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8436">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8436">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8437">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8438">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8438">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8439">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8439">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8440">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8440">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8441">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8441">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8442">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8443">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8443">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8444">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8445">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8445">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8446">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8446">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8447">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8447">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8448">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8448">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8449">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8450">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8450">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8451">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8452">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8452">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8453">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8453">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8454">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8454">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8455">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8455">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8456">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8456">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8457">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8457">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8458">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8458">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8459">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8459">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8460">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8460">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8461">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8462">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8462">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8463">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8464">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8464">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8465">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8465">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8466">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8466">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8467">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8467">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8468">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8468">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8469">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8469">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8470">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8471">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8472">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8473">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8473">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8474">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8474">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8475">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8475">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8477">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8477">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8479">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8479">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8480">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8480">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8482">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8482">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8483">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8484">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8484">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8486">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8486">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8487">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8487">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8488">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8488">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8489">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8489">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8490">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8490">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8491">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8491">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8492">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8493">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8493">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8494">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8495">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8495">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8496">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8496">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8497">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8497">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8621">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8621">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8622">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8623">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8623">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8624">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8625">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8625">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8626">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8627">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8627">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8629">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8630">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8630">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8631">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8631">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8632">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8632">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8633">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8633">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8634">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8634">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8636">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8636">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8637">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8637">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8638">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8638">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8640">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8640">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8641">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8641">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-8642">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8642">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8643">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8643">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8644">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8645">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8645">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8646">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8647">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8647">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8648">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8648">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8649">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8649">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8650">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8651">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8653">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8653">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8654">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8654">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8655">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8655">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8656">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8656">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8657">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8657">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8658">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8658">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8659">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8659">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8671">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8671">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-8672">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8672">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-8673">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8673">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8674">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8675">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8675">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8677">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8677">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8678">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8679">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8680">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8681">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8681">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8682">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8682">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8683">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8683">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8684">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8684">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8685">시작 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8685">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8686">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8686">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8687">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8687">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8688">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8688">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8689">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8689">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8690">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8690">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8691">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8691">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8692">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8692">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8693">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8693">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8694">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8694">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8695">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8695">passport#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8697">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8697">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8698">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8698">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8699">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8699">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8700">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8700">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8703">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8703">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8704">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8704">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8705">Keyword_polish_national_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8705">Keyword_polish_national_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8706">numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8706">numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8707">numery paszportów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8707">numery paszportów</span></span>
