## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8718">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8718">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-8719">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8719">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8720">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8720">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8721">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8721">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8722">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8722">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8723">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8723">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8724">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8724">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8725">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8726">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8726">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8727">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8728">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8728">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8729">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8729">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8730">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8730">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8731">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8731">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8732">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8732">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8733">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8734">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8734">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8735">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8736">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8736">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8737">이 Func_polish_regon_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8737">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8738">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8738">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8739">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8739">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8740">이 Func_polish_regon_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8740">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8757">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8757">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-8758">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8758">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8759">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8759">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8760">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8760">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8761">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8761">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8762">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8762">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8763">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8763">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8764">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8765">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8765">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8766">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8767">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8767">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8768">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8769">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8769">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8770">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8771">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8772">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8772">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8773">시작  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8773">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8803">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8803">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8804">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8805">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8805">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8806">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8807">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8807">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8808">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8808">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8809">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8809">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8810">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8810">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8811">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8811">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8812">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8812">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8813">검색된 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8813">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8814">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8814">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8815">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8815">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8816">bilhete de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8816">bilhete de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8817">cartão de cidadão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8817">cartão de cidadão</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8818">citizen card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8818">citizen card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8819">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8819">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8820">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8820">documento de identificação</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8833">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8833">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8834">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8835">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8835">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8836">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8837">패턴 1: 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8837">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8838">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8838">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8839">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8839">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8840">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8840">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8841">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8841">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8842">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8842">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8843">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8843">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8844">1개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8844">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8845">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8845">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8846">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8846">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8847">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8847">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8848">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8848">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8849">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8850">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8850">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8851">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8852">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8852">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8853">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8853">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8854">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8854">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8986">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8986">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8987">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8987">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8988">공백이나 따로 6자리 숫자를 입력하고 공백이나 따로 문자를 1개씩 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8988">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8989">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8989">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8990">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8990">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8991">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8991">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8992">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8992">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8993">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8993">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8994">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8994">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-8995">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8995">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-8996">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8996">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8997">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8997">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8998">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8998">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-8999">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-8999">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9000">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9000">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9001">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9001">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9002">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9002">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9029">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9029">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9030">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9030">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9031">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9031">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9032">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9032">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9033">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9033">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9034">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9034">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9035">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9035">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9036">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9036">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9037">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9037">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9038">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9038">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9039">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9039">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9040">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9040">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9041">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9041">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9042">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9042">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9043">시작  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9043">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9044">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9044">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9045">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9045">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9070">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9070">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9071">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9072">문자 1개와 숫자 8자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9072">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9073">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9074">한 문자와 8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9074">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9075">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9075">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9076">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9076">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9077">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9077">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9078">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9078">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9079">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9079">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9080">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9080">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9081">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9081">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9082">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9082">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9210">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9210">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9211">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9212">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9213">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9214">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9215">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9216">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9217">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9218">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9218">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9219">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9220">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9220">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9221">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9221">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9222">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9222">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9223">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9223">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9224">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9225">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9225">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9226">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9227">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9228">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9228">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9229">시작  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9229">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9230">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9230">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9231">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9231">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9282">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9282">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9283">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9284">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9284">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9285">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9286">8자리 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9286">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9287">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9288">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9288">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9289">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9290">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9290">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9291">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9291">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9292">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9292">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9293">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9293">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9294">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9295">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9295">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9296">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9296">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9297">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9297">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9298">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9298">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9299">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9299">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9300">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9300">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9301">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9301">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9314">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9314">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9315">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9316">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9317">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9318">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9319">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9320">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9321">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9322">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9322">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9323">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9323">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9324">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9324">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9325">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9325">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9326">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9326">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9327">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9327">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9328">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9328">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9329">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9329">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9330">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9330">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9331">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9331">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9332">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9332">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9333">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9333">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9334">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9334">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9335">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9335">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9352">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9352">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9353">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9353">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9354">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9354">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9355">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9355">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9356">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9356">information governance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9358">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9358">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9359">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9360">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9360">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9361">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9362">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9362">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9363">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9363">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9364">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9364">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9365">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9365">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9366">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9367">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9367">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9368">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9369">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9369">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9370">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9370">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9371">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9371">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9388">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9388">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9389">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9389">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9390">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9390">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9391">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9391">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9392">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9392">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9393">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9393">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9394">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9394">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9395">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9395">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9396">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9396">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9397">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9397">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9398">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9398">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9405">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9405">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9406">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9406">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9407">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9407">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9408">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9408">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9409">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9409">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9410">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9410">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9411">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9411">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9412">사전순 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9412">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9413">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9414">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9414">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9415">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9416">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9417">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9417">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9418">검색된 Keyword_singapore_nric 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9418">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9419">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9419">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9420">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9421">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9421">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9422">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9422">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9423">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9423">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9424">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9424">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9425">National Registration Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9425">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9426">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9426">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9427">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9427">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9428">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9428">IC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9429">Foreign Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9429">Foreign Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9430">FIN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9430">FIN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9431">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9431">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9432">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9432">身份證</span></span> 

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9433">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9433">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9434">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9434">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9435">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9435">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9436">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9436">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9437">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9437">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9438">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9438">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9439">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9439">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9440">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9441">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9441">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9442">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9443">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9443">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9444">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9444">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9445">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9445">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9571">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9571">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9572">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9573">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9574">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9575">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9576">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9577">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9578">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9579">선택적 백 슬래시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9579">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9580">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9580">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9581">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9581">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9582">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9582">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9583">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9583">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9584">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9584">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9585">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9586">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9586">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9587">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9588">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9588">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9589">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9589">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9590">시작  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9590">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9591">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9591">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9592">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9592">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9639">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9639">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9640">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9641">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9641">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9642">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9643">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9643">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9644">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9645">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9645">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9646">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9647">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9647">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9648">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9648">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9649">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9649">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9650">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9650">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9651">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9651">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9652">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9652">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9653">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9675">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9675">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9676">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9677">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9677">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9678">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9679">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9679">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9680">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9681">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9681">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9682">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9683">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9684">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9684">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9685">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9685">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9812">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9812">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9813">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9813">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9814">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9814">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9815">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9815">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9816">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9816">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9817">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9817">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9818">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9818">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9819">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9820">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9820">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9822">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9822">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9823">"LLL"이 생년월일의 마지막 3자리에 해당하는 생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9823">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9824">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9824">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9825">같은 날에 출생한 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9825">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9826">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9826">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9827">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9828">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9828">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9829">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9829">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9830">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9830">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9831">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9831">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9832">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9832">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9833">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9834">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9834">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9862">솔로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9862">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9863">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9864">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력할 때 공백이나 공백이 없는 문자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9864">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9865">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9866">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9866">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9867">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9867">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9868">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9868">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9869">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9869">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9870">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9871">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9871">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9872">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9873">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9873">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9874">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9874">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9875">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9875">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9876">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9876">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9877">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9878">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9878">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9879">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9879">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9902">솔로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9902">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9903">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9904">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9905">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9906">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9907">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9908">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9909">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9910">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9910">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9911">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9911">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9912">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9912">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9913">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9913">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9914">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9914">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9915">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9916">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9916">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9917">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9918">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9918">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9919">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9919">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9920">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9920">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-9921">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9922">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9922">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
