## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9946">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9946">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9947">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9948">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9948">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9949">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9949">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9950">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9950">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9951">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9951">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9952">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9952">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9953">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9953">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9954">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9954">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9955">체크 um 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9955">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9956">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9957">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9957">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9958">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9959">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9959">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9960">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9960">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9961">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9961">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9962">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9962">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9963">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9963">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9964">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9964">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9967">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9967">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9968">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9968">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9969">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9970">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9970">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9971">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9972">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9972">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9973">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9973">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9974">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9974">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9975">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9975">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9976">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9976">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9977">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9977">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9978">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9978">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9979">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9980">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9980">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9981">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9982">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9982">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9983">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9983">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9984">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9984">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9985">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9985">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9986">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9987">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9987">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9988">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9988">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9989">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9989">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9990">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9990">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9991">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9991">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9992">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9992">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9993">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9993">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9994">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9994">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-9995">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9995">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9996">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9996">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9997">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-9998">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9998">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-9999">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-9999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10000">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10000">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10001">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10001">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10002">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10002">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10003">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10003">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10004">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10004">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10005">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10005">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10006">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10006">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10007">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10007">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10008">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10008">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10009">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10009">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10010">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10010">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10144">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10144">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10145">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10145">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10146">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10146">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10147">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10147">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10148">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10148">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10149">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10149">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10150">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10150">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10151">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10152">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10152">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10153">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10154">7자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10154">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10155">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10155">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10156">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10156">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10157">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10157">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10158">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10159">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10159">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10160">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10161">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10162">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10162">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10163">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10163">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10164">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10165">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10165">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10189">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10189">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10190">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10191">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8자 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10191">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10192">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10193">8자 또는 9자 조합의 문자와 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10193">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10194">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10194">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10195">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10195">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10196">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10196">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10197">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10198">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10198">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10199">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10200">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10200">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10201">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10201">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10202">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10202">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10203">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10203">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10204">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10204">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10205">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10205">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10206">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10206">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10235">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10235">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10236">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10237">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10237">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10238">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10239">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10239">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10240">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10240">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10241">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10241">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10242">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10242">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10243">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10243">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10244">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10244">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10245">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10246">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10246">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10247">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10248">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10249">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10249">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10250">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10250">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="58649-10251">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10251">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10252">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10253">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10253">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10254">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10254">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10255">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10255">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10256">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10256">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10257">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10257">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10258">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10258">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10259">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10259">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10260">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10260">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10261">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10261">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10262">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10262">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10263">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10263">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10264">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10264">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10265">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10265">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10266">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10266">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10267">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10267">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10268">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10268">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10269">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10269">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10270">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10271">지정된 패턴에서 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10271">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10272">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10273">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10273">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10274">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10274">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10275">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10275">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10276">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10276">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10277">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10277">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10278">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10278">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10279">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10279">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10280">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만의 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10280">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10281">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10281">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10282">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10282">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10283">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10283">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10284">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10284">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10285">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10285">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10286">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10286">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10287">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10287">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10288">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10288">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10289">"M"을(를) 구분하는 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10289">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10290">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10290">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10291">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10291">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10292">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10293">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10293">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10294">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10295">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10295">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10296">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10296">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10297">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10297">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10298">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10299">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10299">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10300">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10300">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10301">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10301">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10302">cif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10302">cif</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10303">cifid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10303">cifid#</span></span>

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10330">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10330">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10331">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10332">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10332">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10333">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10334">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10334">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10335">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10335">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10336">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd"에서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10336">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10337">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10337">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10338">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미코론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10338">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10339">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 인용 부호(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10339">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10340">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10340">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10341">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10342">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10344">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10344">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10345">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10345">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10346">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10346">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10347">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10347">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10348">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10348">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10349">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10349">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10350">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10350">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10351">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10351">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10352">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10352">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10353">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10353">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10354">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10354">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10355">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10355">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10356">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10356">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10357">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10357">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10358">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10358">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-10359">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10359">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-10360">기호(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10360">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-10361">대/소문자, 숫자, 추가 문자(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자에 대한 1-200자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10361">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-10362">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10362">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10363">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10363">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10364">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10364">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10365">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10365">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10368">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10368">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10369">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10369">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10370">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10370">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10371">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10371">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10372">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10372">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-10373">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10373">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10374">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10374">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="58649-10375">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10375">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10376">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10376">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10377">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10378">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10378">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10379">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10380">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10380">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10381">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10381">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10382">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10382">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10383">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10383">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10384">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10385">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10385">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10386">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10387">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10388">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10388">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10389">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10522">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10522">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10523">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10524">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10524">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10525">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10526">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10526">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10527">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10527">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10528">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10528">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10529">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10529">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10530">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10530">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10531">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10532">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10532">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10533">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10534">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10534">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10535">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10535">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10536">키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10536">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10537">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10538">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10538">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10539">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10539">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10540">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10540">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10559">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10559">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10560">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10561">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10561">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10562">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10563">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10563">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10564">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10565">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10565">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10566">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10567">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10567">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10568">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10568">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10569">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10569">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10570">`Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(01 JAN/JAN 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10570">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10571">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10571">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10572">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10572">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10573">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10573">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10609">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10609">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10610">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10610">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10611">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10611">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10612">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10612">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10613">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10613">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10614">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10614">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10615">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10615">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10616">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10617">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10617">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10618">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10619">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10619">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10620">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10620">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10621">더하기 기호 또는 마이너스 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10621">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10622">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 세 자리 숫자입니다. 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10622">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="58649-10623">1990년 전에 발급된 숫자의 경우 7번째와 8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외계인을 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10623">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="58649-10624">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성에 대해 홀수로 나타내거나 여성의 경우 조차도 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10624">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10625">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10625">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10626">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10627">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10629">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10629">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10630">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10630">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10631">시작  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10631">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10632">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10632">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10633">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10633">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10635">Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10635">Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10659">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10659">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10660">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10661">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10661">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10663">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10663">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10664">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10664">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10665">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10665">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10666">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10666">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10667">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10667">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10668">1~3자리 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10668">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10669">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10670">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10670">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10671">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10672">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10673">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10673">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10674">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10674">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10711">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10711">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10712">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10712">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10713">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10713">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10714">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10714">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10715">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10715">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10716">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10716">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10717">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10717">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10718">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10719">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10719">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10721">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10721">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10722">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10722">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10723">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10723">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10724">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10724">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10725">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10725">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10726">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10726">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10727">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10727">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10728">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10728">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10729">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10730">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10730">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10731">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10732">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10732">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10733">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10733">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10734">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10734">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10735">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10735">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10736">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10736">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10757">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10757">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10758">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10758">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10759">1개의 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10759">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10760">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10760">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10761">한 문자(영어) 다음에 9자리 숫자를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10761">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10762">한 글자(영어로, 대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10762">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10763">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10763">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10764">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10764">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10765">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10766">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10766">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10767">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10768">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10769">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10769">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10770">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10770">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10771">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10772">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10773">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10773">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10774">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10774">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
