## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10791">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10791">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10792">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10792">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10793">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10793">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10794">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10794">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10795">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10795">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-10796">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10796">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10797">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10797">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10798">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10798">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10799">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10799">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10800">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10800">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10801">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10802">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10802">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10803">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10804">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10804">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10805">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10805">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10806">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10806">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10807">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10807">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10808">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10808">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10809">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10809">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10810">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10810">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10811">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10811">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10812">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10812">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10813">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10813">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10814">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10814">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10815">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10815">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10816">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10816">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10817">대만 거주 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10817">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10818">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10819">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10819">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10820">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10821">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10821">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10822">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10822">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10823">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10823">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10824">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10825">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10825">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10826">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10827">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10828">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10828">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10829">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10829">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10830">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10830">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10831">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10831">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10832">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10832">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10833">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10833">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10834">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10834">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10835">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10835">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10836">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10836">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10837">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10837">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10838">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10838">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10839">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10839">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10840">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10840">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10841">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10841">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10842">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10842">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10843">태국어 인구 ID 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10843">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10844">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10845">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10845">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10847">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10847">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10848">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10848">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10849">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10849">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10850">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10851">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10851">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10852">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10853">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10854">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10854">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10855">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10855">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10856">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10857">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10857">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10858">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10858">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10859">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10859">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10860">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10860">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10861">Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10861">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10862">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10862">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10865">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10865">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10866">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10866">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10867">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10867">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10868">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10868">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10869">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10869">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10870">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10870">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10871">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10872">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10872">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10873">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10874">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10874">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10875">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10875">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10876">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10876">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10877">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10878">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10878">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10879">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10879">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10880">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10880">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10881">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10881">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10882">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10882">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10883">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10883">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10884">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10884">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10885">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10885">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-10886">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10886">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10887">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10887">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10888">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10888">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10889">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10889">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10890">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10890">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10891">5개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10891">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10892">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10892">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10893">생년월일의 날짜 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10893">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-10894">드라이버가 여성인 경우 일곱 번째 문자가 50으로 증가합니다. 시험의 경우 01에서 12까지가 아니라 51에서 62까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10894">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10895">대소문자 2개(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10895">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10896">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10896">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10897">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10898">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-10899">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10900">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10901">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10901">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10902">시작 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10902">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10903">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-10904">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10904">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10905">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10905">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-10906">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-10906">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11027">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11027">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-11028">선택 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11028">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11029">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11030">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11030">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11031">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11032">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11032">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11033">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11034">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11034">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11035">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11036">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11037">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11037">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11038">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11038">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11039">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11039">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11040">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11040">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11041">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11041">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11042">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11042">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11043">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11043">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11044">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11044">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11045">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11045">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-11046">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11046">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11047">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11047">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11048">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11048">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11049">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11049">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11050">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11050">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11051">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11051">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11052">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11052">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11053">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11053">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11054">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11054">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11055">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11055">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11056">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11056">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11057">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11057">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11058">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11058">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11059">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11059">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11060">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11060">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11061">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11061">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-11062">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11062">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-11063">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11063">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="58649-11064">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11064">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11065">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11065">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11066">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11066">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11083">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11083">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-11084">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11084">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-11085">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11085">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-11086">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11086">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11087">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11088">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11088">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11089">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11090">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11090">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11091">두 문자(유효한 NINOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11091">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11092">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11092">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11093">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11093">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11094">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11094">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11095">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11095">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11096">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11096">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11097">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11097">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11098">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11098">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11099">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11099">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11100">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11100">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11101">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11101">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11102">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11102">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11103">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11103">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11104">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11104">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11105">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11105">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11106">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11107">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11107">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11108">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11108">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11109">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11109">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11110">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11111">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11111">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11133">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11133">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-11134">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11134">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-11135">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11135">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11136">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11136">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11137">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11137">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11138">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11138">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11139">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11139">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11140">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11140">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11141">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11142">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11142">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11143">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11144">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11144">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11145">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11145">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11146">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11146">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11147">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11147">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11148">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11148">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11149">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11149">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11150">시작  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11150">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11170">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11170">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11171">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11172">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11172">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11174">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11174">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11175">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11175">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11176">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11176">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11177">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11177">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11178">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11178">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11179">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11179">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11180">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11180">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11210">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11210">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11211">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11212">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11212">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11213">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11214">주에 따라 다를 수 있습니다. 예: 뉴욕:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11214">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11215">ddd ddd ddd와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11215">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11216">dddddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11216">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11217">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11217">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11218">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11218">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11219">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11219">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11220">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11220">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11221">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11221">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11222">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11222">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11223">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11223">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11224">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11224">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11225">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11225">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11226">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11226">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11227">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11227">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11228">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11228">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11326">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11326">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11327">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11328">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자이며 선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식이 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11328">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11330">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11330">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11331">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11331">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11332">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11332">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11333">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11333">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11334">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11334">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11335">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11335">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11336">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11336">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11337">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11337">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11338">unformatted:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11338">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11339">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11339">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11340">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11340">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11341">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11341">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11342">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11342">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11343">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11344">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11344">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11345">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11346">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11347">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11347">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11348">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11348">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11349">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11350">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11350">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11351">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11351">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11352">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11352">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11353">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11353">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11354">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11354">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11355">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11355">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11356">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11356">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11357">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11357">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11358">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11358">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11359">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11359">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11360">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11360">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11361">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11361">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11362">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11362">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11363">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11363">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11364">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11364">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11365">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11365">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11366">에 대한 나타</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11366">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11367">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11367">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11368">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11368">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11369">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11370">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11370">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="58649-11371">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강력합니다. 이 서식은 숫자의 특정 부분이 특정 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11371">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11372">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11373">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 찾아보세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11373">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11374">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년보다 강력한 서식이 있는 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11374">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11375">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 서식이 지정되지 않은 강력한 2011 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11375">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11376">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 공백(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd d)으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11376">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11377">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로폼이 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11377">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11378">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11379">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11379">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11380">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11381">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11381">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11382">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11382">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11383">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11383">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11384">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11384">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11385">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11385">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11386">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11386">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11387">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11387">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11388">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11388">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11389">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11389">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11390">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11390">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11391">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11391">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11392">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11392">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11393">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11393">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11394">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11394">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11395">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11395">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11396">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11396">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11397">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11397">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11398">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11398">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11399">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11399">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11400">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11400">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11401">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11401">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11402">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11402">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11403">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11403">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11404">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11404">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11405">SS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11405">SS#</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11407">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11407">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="58649-11408">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11408">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11409">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11410">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11410">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11411">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11412">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11412">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11413">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11414">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11414">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11415">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11416">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11417">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11417">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11418">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11418">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11419">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11419">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11420">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11421">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11421">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11422">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11422">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11438">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11438">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-11439">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11439">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11440">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11440">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11441">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11441">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11442">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11442">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11443">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11443">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11444">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11444">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11445">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11445">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11446">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11446">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11447">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11447">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11448">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11448">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11449">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11450">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11450">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11451">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11452">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11452">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11453">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11453">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11454">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11454">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11463">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11463">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="58649-11464">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11464">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11465">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11465">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11466">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11466">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11467">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11467">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11468">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11468">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11469">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11469">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11470">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11471">8자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11471">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11472">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11473">8자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11473">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11474">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11474">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11475">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11475">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11476">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11477">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11477">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="58649-11478">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="58649-11479">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11480">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11480">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11481">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11481">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="58649-11488">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="58649-11488">номер паспорта</span></span>
